forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers this morning with some sunshine during the afternoon hours. High 16C. S winds shifting to W at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers this morning with some sunshine during the afternoon hours. High near 60F. S winds shifting to W at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few passing clouds, otherwise generally clear. Low around 5C. Winds W at 15 to 30 km/h, becoming SSE and decreasing to 5 to 10 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few passing clouds, otherwise generally clear. Low 42F. Winds W at 10 to 20 mph, becoming SSE and decreasing to less than 5 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies in the morning will give way to cloudy skies during the afternoon. High 16C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine in the morning with more clouds for later in the day. High 61F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with heavy rain developing after midnight. Thunder possible. Low 7C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast skies with heavy rain likely after midnight. Thunder possible. Low near 45F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers likely and possibly a thunderstorm in the morning, then some lingering showers still possible in the afternoon. High 17C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
